alert.note: Alert for Baraga; Gogebic; Houghton; Iron; Keweenaw; Ontonagon; Southern Houghton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 17 at 3:11PM EST until February 19 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM EST /6 AM CST/ FRIDAY TO 1 AM EST /MIDNIGHT CST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow and areas of blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. Northwest winds gusting as high as 40 mph, with higher gusts near 50 mph being possible across the higher terrain and near the lakeshores of the Keweenaw Peninsula. * WHERE...Portions of central Upper and western Upper Michigan. * WHEN...From 7 AM EST /6 AM CST/ Friday to 1 AM EST /midnight CST/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility and result in snow drifts on roadways. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There is the potential for near blizzard conditions in northern Houghton and Keweenaw counties Friday evening. Travelers should remain vigilant for future forecasts and plan on extra time to reach their destination or consider adjusting their travel plans.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Baraga; Gogebic; Houghton; Iron; Keweenaw; Ontonagon; Southern Houghton
